alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 7:34PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Broward County through 800 PM EDT... At 734 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, or 13 miles west of Sunrise. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Weston, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27 and Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County
